turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Religion in Guatemala.
turn.1: What is the main religion in Guatemala?
turn.2: Religion in Guatemala Christianity remains strong and vital for the life of Guatemalan society, but its composition has changed considerably in recent decades.
turn.3: Is roman catholicism the main religion in guatemala
turn.4: Roman Catholicism was the official religion in Guatemala during the colonial era and currently has a special status under the constitution.
turn.5: What are the other religions in Guatemala
turn.6: Evangelical Protestantism (Protestants are called "Evangelicos" in Latin America) and later Eastern Orthodoxy and Oriental Orthodoxy have increased in recent decades.
turn.8: About 42% of Guatemalans are Protestant, chiefly independent Evangelicals and Pentecostals.
turn.9: Are there any other religions in guatemala
turn.10: The Eastern Orthodox Church and Oriental Orthodoxy claim rapid growth, especially among the indigenous Maya peoples.
turn.11: Do people have to be a certain religion
turn.12: The constitution of Guatemala establishes the freedom of religion.
